text: The 2017 CONCACAF Gold Cup was the 14th CONCACAF Gold Cup tournament. It featured teams from North and Central America, along with some Caribbean teams. The tournament was played between 7–26 July 2017. It was hosted by the United States. Mexico were the defending champions. == Teams == * * * * * * * * * * * * (host) == Results == === Group stage === ==== Group A ==== Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 3 2 1 0 5 1 +4 7 2 3 1 2 0 5 3 +2
